card_name: Tata Neu Plus HDFC Bank Credit Card
annual_fee_waiver: Spend ₹1,00,000 or more in a year, before your Credit Card renewal date and get your renewal fee waived off.
rewards_program: 2% back as NeuCoins on Non-EMI Spends on Tata Neu and partner Tata Brands.
cashback_with_every_transaction: 1% back as NeuCoins on Non-Tata Brand Spends and any Merchant EMI Spends.
features: 4 Complimentary Domestic Airport Lounge Access, 1% Unlimited CashBack on all spends, 50 days interest-free credit period.
welcome_benefit: Get 499 NeuCoins on Tata Neu App (as reversal of 1st Year Membership Fees), applicable on 1st Transaction done within 30 days of card issuance.
fuel_benefits: 1% fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations across India.
full_card_description: The Tata Neu Plus HDFC Bank credit card offers various benefits such as 50 days interest free period, airport lounge access, fuel surcharge waiver and more.

card_usp: 5% Cashback on Amazon, BookMyShow, Cult.fit, Flipkart, Myntra, Sony LIV, Swiggy, Tata CLiQ, Uber and Zomato
annual_fee_waiver: Spend ₹1 lakh or more in the preceding 12 months and get renewal membership fee waived off for next year.
fuel_transaction_fee: 1% fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations across India (on minimum transaction of ₹400 & maximum transaction of ₹5,000. Maximum waiver of ₹250 per statement cycle)
rewards_program: Earn 5% Cashback on select merchants and 1% on other spends.
spend_based_reversal: Annual fee reversed if spends > ₹1 lakh/year
rewards: ₹1000 worth gift vouchers on spends of ₹1,00,000 and above in each calendar quarter
features: Zero lost card liability, Interest Free Credit Period, Revolving Credit, Exclusive Dining Privileges, Contactless Payment
welcome_benefit: Pay your Membership fee and get Reward Points equivalent to Fee Amount
milestone_benefit: Free flight ticket on spends above ₹5 lakh/year
cashback_offers: Specific cashback promotions for eligible transactions
lounge_access: Lounge access is now integrated into quarterly spends milestone program.
fraud_protection: Zero liability if reported within 24 hours
full_card_description: This card offers premium travel, shopping, and lifestyle benefits, including lounge access, high rewards, and robust insurance, making it ideal for frequent travelers.
terms_and_conditions: All dues must be paid on time; rewards program subject to change.

card_name: 6E Rewards XL - IndiGo HDFC Bank Credit Card
card_usp: Earn up to 5% 6E Rewards on IndiGo spends and redeem them for free flights.
rewards_program: Earn 5 6E Rewards per ₹100 spent on IndiGo flights, 3 6E Rewards on groceries, dining, and entertainment, and 2 6E Rewards on all other spends.
rewards: Complimentary flight ticket voucher worth ₹3,000 and 6E Prime add-on worth ₹1,099.
features: 8 complimentary domestic lounge accesses per year, interest-free credit period of up to 50 days, zero lost card liability.
welcome_benefit: 1 complimentary flight ticket voucher worth ₹3,000 and 1 complimentary 6E Prime add-on worth ₹1,099.
fuel_benefits: 1% fuel surcharge waiver (up to ₹500 per month) on fuel transactions above ₹400.
lounge_access: 8 complimentary domestic lounge visits per year (max. 2 per quarter).
fraud_protection: Zero liability on fraudulent transactions if reported immediately.
full_card_description: The 6E Rewards XL IndiGo HDFC Bank Credit Card is designed for frequent travelers with IndiGo, offering high rewards on travel and everyday spending, along with complimentary lounge access and a welcome flight voucher.
eligibility_criteria: Age: 21 to 65 years; Income Requirement: ₹1.2 Lakh for Salaried Individuals and ITR > ₹14.4 LPA for Self-employed.
terms_and_conditions: All dues must be paid on time; rewards program subject to change.

card_name: 6E Rewards - IndiGo HDFC Bank Credit Card
card_usp: Converts all spends into FREE flight tickets
rewards_program: Earn 2.5 6E Rewards per Rs.100 on flights, 2 6E Rewards per Rs.100 on Grocery, Dining & Entertainment, 1 6E Reward per Rs.100 on all other spends
rewards: Complimentary flight ticket voucher worth INR 1,500, Complimentary 6E Prime Add-On worth INR 1,099
features: Contactless payments, Interest Free Credit Period up to 50 days
welcome_benefit: 1 Complimentary flight ticket voucher worth INR 1,500
